body.name: Aipolloo Under Cabinet Lighting 2 Pack, 69 LED Rechargeable Battery Operated Light, 3000mAh Wireless Motion Sensor Closet Lights Indoor, Night Light, Under Counter Lights for Kitchen
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 16. Order within 8 hrs 11 mins
features: 【Infrared Induction, Motion Detection】The PIR sensors on the motion sensor lights detect human motion by sensing the temperature changes within the detection area(Range: 16ft, Angle: 120°). Once detecting your approaching, the light is activated and will shut off after 15s you leave, making it convenient to use under low light conditions.

【69-LED Light with 3 switch Modes】LED beads are hidden behind the thinner housings of the night lights, delivering even and gentle 6000K white light that is free of dazzling, video flash, or harm to the eyes. Higher lumen up to 250±20% achieves a optimum illuminated area. Switch Modes:(ON/OFF)Mode,(Auto)Mode.

【USB Charging, No Battery Required】Charge the under cabinet lighting by plugging the included USB charging cable into a PC, socket, or power bank. The inbuilt 3000mAh lithium battery about 5 hours to get a full charge and powers the LED light for 1.5 to 2 months (if the light is activated five times a day). Charge occasionally but benefit daily.

【Magnetic Absorption, Effortless Installation】No drilling or screwing is needed for installation. With the help of the strong magnet inside the closet light, you can choose between two installation methods - directly absorbing onto metal surfaces or utilizing the adhesive tapes and metal pieces. When necessary, take the lights down for illumination at any time.

【Multi-Scene Applicable Wireless LED Lights】The wireless under counter lights for kitchen is designed for multiple uses. This safe and convenient motion sensor light is a safe and great illumination solution for the baby room, stairs, basement, storeroom, cabinet, wardrobe, garage, and trunk. Serve as an emergency light, just in case.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Style Your Room with Motion Sensor Under Cabinet Lighting! Enhance the ambiance and functionality of your space with motion sensor under cabinet lights. Whether you want to illuminate your cabinets, closets, or other areas, these lights offer convenience and energy efficiency. Introducing the Aipolloo Extra-Bright Under Cabinet LED Light! Experience practical task lighting while cooking, navigating stairs, or choosing outfits. Our motion sensor LED light is powered by a rechargeable battery, providing long-lasting illumination without the need for frequent charging. It's perfect for walk-in pantries, closets, bedrooms, bathrooms, hallways, and garages. Installation is a breeze, and the built-in motion sensor allows for hands-free operation, ensuring the lights turn on when you need them and conserve energy when you don't. Say goodbye to dark corners and hello to a well-lit and efficient space with Aipolloo's motion sensor under cabinet lighting solution.

Long-Life Battery Charge the 3000mAh battery and use the LED light for up to 6 months in auto mode, 20 hours in constant mode, or 9 hours in extra-bright mode. Max Brightness Utilizing 69 LED beads, our cupboard light sheds bright, warm, ambient light in any dark area of your house and makes your steps safer at night. Sensitive Motion Detector The cupboard light detects motion from a distance of up to 10 feet and has a practical always-on feature for when you need to dig around in your closet.

Eye-Care 350-Lumen Light Our soft white LED with 6000K brightness ensures a bright but non-glaring experience, providing eye protection. Ideal for families with children or seniors. Energy-Saving LED Light Our under cabinet light has a built-in timer for automatic shut-off after 25 seconds in auto mode, which helps to save energy and extend battery life. Instant Setup The strong magnet will keep this magnetic light fixture on any metallic surface. The 3M adhesive tape will install it on any non-iron surface.

Specifications Dimensions：15.7*1.57*0.35 InchesBattery: 3000mAhInduction Distance：0m-3m 120 AngleCharge Time: 5-7 HoursMaterial: Aluminum+ABSColor Temperature: 6000K 2 x Motion Sensor Closet Lights 2 x USB Cable 4 x Adhesive Tape 4 x Iron Sheet 2 x User Manual

Warm Tips: 1. Please charge battery when light goes dim. When the light is charging, the infrared sensor will not work,please use the sensor mode (Auto mode) after charging is complete. 2. Please fully charge the lights before using it for the first time after receiving it and try to use a nationally certified CCC adapter with an output of 5V, 1A (other chargers will affect charging time)

Warm Tips: 1. Please charge battery when light goes dim. When the light is charging, the infrared sensor will not work,please use the sensor mode (Auto mode) after charging is complete. 2. Please fully charge the lights before using it for the first time after receiving it and try to use a nationally certified CCC adapter with an output of 5V, 1A (other chargers will affect charging time)

One Set Of Lights, 100+1 Different Uses Cover all your indoor lighting needs with the Airpollo rechargeable under counter LED lights. The wireless design combined with the long-lasting battery (when used in the Motion Sensor mode) will allow you to use them as: Cabinet LightsUnder Counter LightsWine Cabinet LightsBookcase LightsCorridor LightsWardrobe LightsDrawer LightsOr Bathroom Cabinet Lights

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The battery seems to last quite a while. I put it under my bed so I don’t have to deal with lights if I hat over up in the middle of the night. The light is bright enough to get you around safely but not annoying when you have to wake up. Easy to attach to a metal frame because it is magnified. There is another set of attachments that can be stuck.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EXCELLENT MAGNET AND THE SENSOR LIGHT
reviews.reviewText: I use this light on my kitchen hood. Excellent and brightness is okay. but need to charge quite frequently attest everyday once. I planning to buy 2 more so that I can charge them and use them continuously in the kitchen for breakfast and dinner cooking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Decent wireless, rechargeable light.
reviews.reviewText: Good size for what I was looking for. Magnets are not very strong as the light fell out of the cradles when I reach up to turn it on. Could be brighter so be sure that you aren’t looking for more than just a little illumination.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice look great in our kitchen
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t know we needed them until my husband installed them now I am so glad he did they look great and actually help a lot! Easy to use easy to install very happy with our purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install and battery seems to last
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install and battery seems to last. Like the brightness and auto on and off

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very simple to Install and use.Great light sourceCan be installed anywhere. No tools required.Highly recommend this light source.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The Batteries Die So Fast
reviews.reviewText: I don’t like how this product was sold as an under the cabinet light… they die so quickly that it is not worth the money. They typically last only a day and a half on a full charge which is a waste of time continuously charging them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars The motion sense is pointless
reviews.reviewText: Although the light is bright and installs easy, it's a pointless light. The switch to turn it on it tiny so you rely on the motion sense. But, the motion sense only works is extremely dark conditions. So unless you cook with all your lights off, this is pointless.
